incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Network Services] - Bring Your Own IP incident notification

incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Our teams are currently working on a fix to solve the issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Network Services offer. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 31/07/2025 10:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Import of RIPE IP blocks is temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customer cannot import their RIPE IP blocks (the order process will show a "Cannot contact RIPE" error message). Root Cause : The incident is due to an issue by our provider. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Network Services] - Additional IP whois customisation incident notification

incident_updates.body: We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s). Please find below an update on the situation: Update : Our teams are currently working on a fix to solve the issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Network Services offer. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 31/07/2025 10:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Customisation of RIPE Additional IP WHOIS is temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customer cannot customise the WHOIS of their RIPE IP block. Root Cause : The incident is due to an issue by our provider. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
